tool_description: Calculates optimal shipping routes considering distance, cost, delivery time, and various constraints for single or multi-modal transportation.

optimization_priority.description: Primary optimization goal: cost, time, or distance

transport_modes.description: Allowed transport modes: road, rail, air, sea

avoid_regions.description: Regions or countries to avoid in routing

error_messages: Invalid location: Origin or destination location cannot be resolved. Provide valid addresses or coordinates.
Unsupported transport mode: Use only supported modes: road, rail, air, sea.
No viable route found: Unable to find a route with specified constraints. Try relaxing restrictions.
Optimization priority invalid: Use one of: cost, time, or distance.
Max stops out of range: Maximum stops must be between 0 and 10.
usage: Provide origin_location and destination_location. Optionally specify optimization_priority, allowed transport_modes, max_stops, and regions to avoid.

transport_legs.description: Breakdown of route segments by transport mode

alternative_routes.description: Alternative route options with basic details
